descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Arkay's Hand[/color] for Skyrim v1.0 Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Author[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures

***

This mod adds an Imperial shelter not very far from Rorikstead. You can obtain the new weapon here - Arkay's Hand.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY ONE ESP-FILE!!![/color]
